name: Where the **** did I put my keys?
name_original: Where the **** did I put my keys?
description:
This is a game about loss... and finding something more than you were originally looking for.

This is my first time using Twine. Seems straight forward. Started working on this on the Sunday of Game Jam after Moderating the AUS GGJ discord. 

Progress and Future updates:

Its not currently finished, so i may come back to it later to polish it. Check for future updates at my itch.io page:  https://scoobydrewau.itch.io/
